sections.heading: 01|Foreign corporation definitions
sections.text: Effective:May 21, 1997Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 40 - 122nd General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections1703.01to1703.31of the Revised Code:(A) "Domestic corporation" means a corporation incorporated under the laws of this state or a bank,

sections.heading: the Revised Code do not apply to corporations engaged in this state solely in interstate commerce, including the installation, demonstration, or repair of machinery or equipment sold by them in interstate commerce, by engineers, or by employees especially experienced as to such machinery or equipmen
sections.text: the Revised Code do not apply to corporations engaged in this state solely in interstate commerce, including the installation, demonstration, or repair of machinery or equipment sold by them in interstate commerce, by engineers, or by employees especially experienced as to such machinery or equipment, as part thereof; to credit unions, title guarantee and trust companies, bond investment companies, and insurance companies; or to public utility companies engaged in this state in interstate commerce.
